DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate pharmacokinetics single oral dose Amitriptyline hydrochloride film-coated tablet 10mg & 25mg
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Pharmacokinetic Profiles Etravil® Tablet 10mg Etravil® Tablet 25mg
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , Single dose , 2-way crossover , Open Study compare pharmacokinetics profile Etravil® ( Amitriptyline Hydrochloride ) Tablet 10mg Etravil® ( Amitriptyline Hydrochloride ) Tablet 25mg single oral administration healthy male volunteer
